name: ExtensionFactory
description: Allows to extend the existing applications from a module.
rawdescription: Allows to extend the existing applications from a module.

methods.name: get
methods.rawdescription:
Allows to resolve the data of an extension point.
The return value can be a Promise or Observable
(allowing for asynchronous data resolution).
methods.description: Allows to resolve the data of an extension point. The return value can be a Promise or Observable (allowing for asynchronous data resolution).

jsdoctags.comment: The current activated route (if possible to resolve).
